===Noun===

# [[chengyu]], a certain kind of Chinese [[set phrase]] originating in [[Classical Chinese]], typically four or five [[character]]s in length {{zh-mw|句|個|條|本}}
#: {{zh-x|我 最 喜歡 的 成語 是 「畫蛇添足」。|My favourite '''chengyu''' is "huàshétiānzú".}}
# any [[idiomatic]] [[expression]] or [[set phrase]] {{zh-mw|句|個|條|本}}

====Usage notes====
* Although often translated as ''[[idiom]]'', in fact {{zh-l|成語|chéngyǔ}} refers to a specific kind of idiomatic expression in Chinese (see [[w:Chengyu|Chengyu]]). Other kinds of [[idiom]]s include {{zh-l|俗語}}, {{zh-l|諺語}} and {{zh-l|歇後語}}. The specific word for ''idiom'' or ''idiomatic expression'' in Chinese is {{zh-l|習慣用語}} or {{zh-l|習語}}.
